nodes.text: Tanc mites were insects native to the jungle moon Yavin 4.
These creatures had six legs, two arms that ended in claws and two antennae. Tanc mite hives were ruled by a queen.

Circa 1 ABY, a small population of tanc mites populated the atrium of Tansarii Point Station. The Jedi Nos'lyn tasked an aspiring Jedi to eliminate these tanc mites in order to train him to fight in the ways of the Force.
